title: "RoboNotify"
content: RoboNotify is a minimalist website that helps you stay on top of your important notifications and messages. Our simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone serves as the main wallpaper, providing a sleek and modern aesthetic to your desktop or mobile device. With its clean design, RoboNotify allows you to focus on what matters most - staying organized and productive. Whether you're using it for work or personal use, our website makes it easy to keep track of your messages and never miss an important update. Try RoboNotify today and simplify your digital life.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone, with a space for placing important notifications or messages."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
